I beseech<S>3870</S> you<S>5209</S> therefore<S>3767</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, by<S>1223</S> the mercies<S>3628</S> of God<S>2316</S>, that ye present<S>3936</S> your<S>5216</S> bodies<S>4983</S> a living<S>2198</S> sacrifice<S>2378</S>, holy<S>40</S>, acceptable<S>2101</S> unto God<S>2316</S>, which is your<S>5216</S> reasonable<S>3050</S> service<S>2999</S>.
And<S>2532</S> be<S>4964</S> not<S>3361</S> conformed<S>4964</S> to this<S>5129</S> world<S>165</S>: but<S>235</S> be ye transformed<S>3339</S> by the renewing<S>342</S> of your<S>5216</S> mind<S>3563</S>, that<S>1519</S> ye<S>5209</S> may prove<S>1381</S> what<S>5101</S> is that good<S>18</S>, and<S>2532</S> acceptable<S>2101</S>, and<S>2532</S> perfect<S>5046</S>, will<S>2307</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
For<S>1063</S> I say<S>3004</S>, through<S>1223</S> the grace<S>5485</S> given<S>1325</S> unto me<S>3427</S>, to every man<S>3956</S> that is<S>5607</S> among<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>, not<S>3361</S> to think of himself more<S>3844</S> highly<S>5252</S> than<S>3739</S> he ought<S>1163</S> to think<S>5426</S>; but<S>235</S> to think<S>5426</S> soberly<S>1519</S> <S>4993</S>, according as<S>5613</S> God<S>2316</S> hath dealt<S>3307</S> to every man<S>1538</S> the measure<S>3358</S> of faith<S>4102</S>. <sup>soberly: Gr. to sobriety</sup>
For<S>1063</S> as<S>2509</S> we have<S>2192</S> many<S>4183</S> members<S>3196</S> in<S>1722</S> one<S>1520</S> body<S>4983</S>, and<S>1161</S> all<S>3956</S> members<S>3196</S> have<S>2192</S> not<S>3756</S> the same<S>846</S> office<S>4234</S>:
So<S>3779</S> we<S>2070</S>, being many<S>4183</S>, are<S>2070</S> one<S>1520</S> body<S>4983</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, and<S>1161</S> every<S>2596</S> one<S>1520</S> members<S>3196</S> one of another<S>240</S>.
Having<S>2192</S> then<S>1161</S> gifts<S>5486</S> differing<S>1313</S> according<S>2596</S> to the grace<S>5485</S> that is given<S>1325</S> to us<S>2254</S>, whether<S>1535</S> prophecy<S>4394</S>, let us prophesy according<S>2596</S> to the proportion<S>356</S> of faith<S>4102</S>;
Or<S>1535</S> ministry<S>1248</S>, let us wait on<S>1722</S> our ministering<S>1248</S>: or<S>1535</S> he that teacheth<S>1321</S>, on<S>1722</S> teaching<S>1319</S>;
Or<S>1535</S> he that exhorteth<S>3870</S>, on<S>1722</S> exhortation<S>3874</S>: he that giveth<S>3330</S>, let him do it with<S>1722</S> simplicity<S>572</S>; he that ruleth<S>4291</S>, with<S>1722</S> diligence<S>4710</S>; he that sheweth mercy<S>1653</S>, with<S>1722</S> cheerfulness<S>2432</S>. <sup>giveth: or, imparteth</sup> <sup>with simplicity: or, liberally</sup>
Let love<S>26</S> be without dissimulation<S>505</S>. Abhor<S>655</S> that which is evil<S>4190</S>; cleave<S>2853</S> to that which is good<S>18</S>.
Be kindly affectioned<S>5387</S> one to another<S>1519</S> <S>240</S> with brotherly love<S>5360</S>; in honour<S>5092</S> preferring<S>4285</S> one another<S>240</S>; <sup>with: or, in the love of the brethren</sup>
Not<S>3361</S> slothful<S>3636</S> in business<S>4710</S>; fervent<S>2204</S> in spirit<S>4151</S>; serving<S>1398</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>;
Rejoicing<S>5463</S> in hope<S>1680</S>; patient<S>5278</S> in tribulation<S>2347</S>; continuing instant<S>4342</S> in prayer<S>4335</S>;
Distributing<S>2841</S> to the necessity<S>5532</S> of saints<S>40</S>; given<S>1377</S> to hospitality<S>5381</S>.
Bless<S>2127</S> them which persecute<S>1377</S> you<S>5209</S>: bless<S>2127</S>, and<S>2532</S> curse<S>2672</S> not<S>3361</S>.
Rejoice<S>5463</S> with<S>3326</S> them that do rejoice<S>5463</S>, and<S>2532</S> weep<S>2799</S> with<S>3326</S> them that weep<S>2799</S>.
Be of the same<S>846</S> mind<S>5426</S> one toward another<S>1519</S> <S>240</S>. Mind<S>5426</S> not<S>3361</S> high things<S>5308</S>, but<S>235</S> condescend<S>4879</S> to men of low estate<S>5011</S>. Be<S>1096</S> not<S>3361</S> wise<S>5429</S> in<S>3844</S> your own conceits<S>1438</S>. <sup>condescend: or, be contented with mean things</sup>
Recompense<S>591</S> to no man<S>3367</S> evil<S>2556</S> for<S>473</S> evil<S>2556</S>. Provide<S>4306</S> things honest<S>2570</S> in the sight<S>1799</S> of all<S>3956</S> men<S>444</S>.
If<S>1487</S> it be possible<S>1415</S>, as much as lieth in<S>1537</S> you<S>5216</S>, live peaceably<S>1514</S> with<S>3326</S> all<S>3956</S> men<S>444</S>.
Dearly beloved<S>27</S>, avenge<S>1556</S> not<S>3361</S> yourselves<S>1438</S>, but<S>235</S> rather give<S>1325</S> place<S>5117</S> unto wrath<S>3709</S>: for<S>1063</S> it is written<S>1125</S>, Vengeance<S>1557</S> is mine<S>1698</S>; I<S>1473</S> will repay<S>467</S>, saith<S>3004</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>.
Therefore<S>3767</S> if<S>1437</S> thine<S>4675</S> enemy<S>2190</S> hunger<S>3983</S>, feed<S>5595</S> him<S>846</S>; if<S>1437</S> he thirst<S>1372</S>, give<S>4222</S> him<S>846</S> drink<S>4222</S>: for<S>1063</S> in so<S>5124</S> doing<S>4160</S> thou shalt heap<S>4987</S> coals<S>440</S> of fire<S>4442</S> on<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> head<S>2776</S>.
Be<S>3528</S> not<S>3361</S> overcome<S>3528</S> of<S>5259</S> evil<S>2556</S>, but<S>235</S> overcome<S>3528</S> evil<S>2556</S> with<S>1722</S> good<S>18</S>.
